commit message: Collapse comments when long pressing on a highlighted comment
fix build error related to album_image.xml
You can now search multireddits, Cut starup time by many API calls (down 3 seconds in my testing), Lots of bug fixes
Bugfixes, Made comments not lose collapsed state after commenting, Made the Snackbar text always white
Fixed some issues with the AsyncSaveTask
Added frontpage and all to first start not logged in, Made seekbar not show in Shadowbox mode, Bug fixes
Fixed some issues with navigating comments and showing the parent comment
Made replying to comments not reload the whole comment view, and instead insert into the current dataset (using my latest change on /ccrama/JRAW)
Fixed crash creating a top-level reply
Few more bug fixes
Bugfixes
Update gradle
Replace hardcoded '/sdcard' references
Externalise and tweak strings
Update translations
Fixed some comment issues
Fixed some issues with the Tutorial activity and colors
Set FLAG_ACTIVITY_NO_HISTORY on the Chrome CustomTab Intent prior to launch. This prevents the webpage to keep running when the Activity is moved to the background.

Fixes #1300 (Fixes refresh if no Settings changed) (#1326)

* Removed RESET_THEME_RESULT

Prevent a webpage to keep running (with sound) in the background when custom tab is closed
Fixed many Shadowbox issues, Added a reply FAB to comments, Added support for reddituploads.com images, Many other bug fixes
Bugfixes, Fixed link syncing with Reddit gold
Hide the FAB if replying to a comment, Fixed images flashing in subreddit sidebar
